xbox.name: Xbox

team.description: The team you are racing for.

maybe.name: Maybe
maybe.description: I might go to the event.

decline.name: Not Going
decline.description: I'm not going to the event.

driver_successful_personal: I have added you to the list.
error_command_not_found: Sorry {author}, I don't know how to do that.
Uhm, {author}, I don't know what you're asking me to do.
Sorry, {author}, I don't know how to do that.
error_command_cooldown: Slow down, {author}. This command is on a cooldown for t-minus {cooldown}.
Please wait {cooldown} before running that command again.
error_command_disabled: I'm sorry {author}, but {command} has been disabled.
No can do, the {command} command has been disabled.
error_command_missing_argument: I'm sorry {author}, but I need more details. such as {param}
error_command_not_in_private: {command} can not be used in Private Messages.
error_command_bad_argument_tag: I am not sure if {argument} is correct...
error_command_bad_argument: {author}, you raise a really bad argument...
error_command_not_owner: {author} You're not the boss of me now!
Nope, I am not going to do that for you {author}.
And I should do that for you because, why?
error_command_missing_permissions: Honestly {author}, you don't have permission to do that.
